SELECT u.id, u.email, COUNT(o.id) as order_count
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
WHERE u.created_at > '2025-01-01'
GROUP BY u.id, u.email
HAVING COUNT(o.id) > 5
ORDER BY order_count DESC;
